about_the_game:
Add DYNASTY WARS to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up!

It's the very end of the Han Dynasty. The Yellow Turban Rebellion has thrown China into turmoil, and the warlord Dong Zhuo threatens the imperial throne itself. In the face of destruction, four men band together, ready to fight to preserve the dynasty!

Players: 1-2 Player Co-Op
Genre: Action
Versions: Japanese & English

© HIROSHI MOTOMIYA © Thirdline © SHUEISHA
©CAPCOM CO., LTD. 1989, 2021 ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.

name: Capcom Arcade Stadium：DYNASTY WARS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 720P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770 or AMD FX™-9590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS. *Xinput support Controllers recommended

dejus.descriptors: Violence, Sexual Content, Legal Drugs, In-Game Purchases

short_description: Add DYNASTY WARS to your Capcom Arcade Stadium game line-up! It's the very end of the Han Dynasty. The Yellow Turban Rebellion has thrown China into turmoil, and the warlord Dong Zhuo threatens the imperial throne itself. In the face of destruction, four men band together, ready to fight to preserve the dynasty!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
